Interactive Map (WIP)
Skill Tree Planner (WIP)

This tool will allow you to plan out your build - assign points to each skill tree, provide a summary of bonuses, points required etc.

This tool will be developed much closer to the full release of the game, considering that the skill trees are constantly evolving.
